mapper.select: SELECT reviewid AS reviewId, productid AS productId, userid AS userId, title, content, picture_url AS pictureUrl, created_at FROM review WHERE reviewid = #{id}
SELECT itemid As itemId, productid As productId FROM item WHERE itemid = #{id}
SELECT productid AS productId, category AS categoryId, name, descn AS description FROM product WHERE productid = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (REVIEWID, PRODUCTID, USERID, TITLE, CONTENT, PICTURE_URL) VALUES(#{reviewId}, #{productId}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{pictureUrl})
INSERT INTO REVIEWRATING (REVIEWID, KEY, RATING) VALUES(#{reviewId}, #{key}, #{rating})
